LanguageData.VAE_Footwear_Boots.label: boots
LanguageData.VAE_Footwear_Boots.description: A simple pair of leather boots.
LanguageData.VAE_Footwear_Shoes.label: shoes
LanguageData.VAE_Footwear_Shoes.description: A fancy pair of leather shoes.
LanguageData.VAE_Handwear_Gloves.label: gloves
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_CasualTShirt.label: Casual T-Shirt
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_CasualTShirt.description: A casual T-Shirt with a cool sticker on it.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_Hoodie.label: худі
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_Hoodie.description: A warm casual hoodie that doesn’t limit wearer’s movement.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_Shorts.label: шорти
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_Shorts.description: A pair of shorts, perfect for hot summer days.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_Skirt.label: спідниця
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_ShirtandTie.label: сорочка з краваткою
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_ShirtandTie.description: A nice looking collared shirt with buttons and a tie.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_SuitJacket.label: піджак
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_Trousers.label: брюки
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_Trousers.description: A nice looking set of suit trousers.
LanguageData.VAE_Headgear_Fedora.label: федора
LanguageData.VAE_Headgear_Fedora.description: A nice looking hat with a soft brim and indented crown.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_Overalls.label: комбінезон
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_Overalls.description: A pair of bib-and-brace overalls perfect for working in the field.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_FleeceShirt.label: флісова сорочка
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_FleeceShirt.description: A soft, checkered, breathable shirt perfect for working in the field.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_Jeans.label: джинси
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_Jeans.description: A pair of thick enough jeans to provide some degree of protection from damage and cold.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_ChefsUniform.label: одяг шеф-кухаря
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_ChefsUniform.description: A thick cloth coat protects from the heat of stoves and splattering of boiling liquids.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_MilitaryJacket.label: військововий піджак
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_MilitaryJacket.description: A thick fabric military formal jacket used for certain ceremonies, receptions and celebrations. It contains orders, medals insignia and campaign ribbons. It is considered a symbol of courage and valor.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_MilitaryUniform.label: військови однострій
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_MilitaryUniform.description: A thick, protective coverall with a military camouflage.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_BuildersJacket.label: куртка будівельника
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_BuildersJacket.description: A jacket with highly reflective properties and a colour that is easily discernible from any background.\n\nMost industrial employees wear it as part of their personal protective equipment.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_DoctorScrubs.label: одяг доктора
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_DoctorScrubs.description: Sanitary clothing worn by surgeons, nurses and other workers involved in patient care. They are designed to be simple, easy to launder and cheap to replace if damaged or stained.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_LabCoat.label: лабораторний халат
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_LabCoat.description: A light coat worn to protect clothing from substances used in a lab.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_TankTop.label: безрукавка
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_TankTop.description: A sleeveless type of T-shirt, useful during prolonged exercise.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_SheriffShirt.label: сорочка шерифа
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_SheriffShirt.description: A formal, thick buttoned-down shirt with a sheriff star on the chest. Provides wearer with a sense of pride and accomplishment.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_Jumpsuit.label: спецівка
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_Jumpsuit.description: A full body jumpsuit made out of thick fabric or leather. Excellent for general body protection and manual labour.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_Tunic.label: туніка
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_Tunic.description: Slightly heavier than a normal shirt, a tunic is a great isolation against cold weather.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_Blouse.label: блузка
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_Blouse.description: Very light and thin blouse, great for hot climates.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_Apron.label: фартух
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_Apron.description: A leather or cloth apron covering legs, waist and chest.\n\nApron like that is often used by craftsmen, doctors and chefs due to useful pockets and protection it provides.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_PeltCoat.label: шуба
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_PeltCoat.description: A heavy coat insulated due to animal pelt, providing warmth and armor.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_TribalPoncho.label: племінне пончо
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_TribalPoncho.description: A poncho crafted using neolithic tools. While it may look primitive, it is effective at insulating the wearer.
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_TribalKilt.label: племінний кілт
LanguageData.VAE_Apparel_TribalKilt.description: A kilt crafted using neolithic tools. While it may look primitive, it is effective at insulating the wearer.
LanguageData.VAE_Headgear_Scarf.label: шарф
LanguageData.VAE_Headgear_Scarf.description: A warm and long piece of fabric protecting the neck from exposure to cold.
LanguageData.VAE_Headgear_Beret.label: військовий берет
LanguageData.VAE_Headgear_Beret.description: A soft, flat crowned hat. Often worn by the military as a symbol of valor.
LanguageData.VAE_Headgear_Hardhat.label: каска
LanguageData.VAE_Headgear_Hardhat.description: A type of helmet predominantly used in a work environment. Provides high protection against blunt trauma.
LanguageData.VAE_Headgear_SurgicalMask.label: медичка наска
LanguageData.VAE_Headgear_SurgicalMask.description: Sanitary mask worn by the surgeons, nurses and other workers involved in patient care.
LanguageData.VAE_Headgear_BaseballCap.label: бейсболка
LanguageData.VAE_Headgear_BaseballCap.description: A type of soft cap with a rounded crown and a stiff peak protecting the front.
LanguageData.VAE_Headgear_Sunglasses.label: сонячні окуляри
LanguageData.VAE_Headgear_Sunglasses.description: A pair of sunglasses protecting the wearer from dangerous UV rays. Often considered to be ‘cool’.
LanguageData.VAE_Headgear_Glasses.label: окуляри
LanguageData.VAE_Headgear_Glasses.description: A pair of correction glasses, providing users with some degree of psychic immunity.
LanguageData.VAE_Headgear_ChefsToque.label: шапочка шеф-кухаря
LanguageData.VAE_Headgear_ChefsToque.description: A tall, round, pleated hat usually worn by the chefs.
